document.full_text: missile attacks by suspected u.s. drone aircraft killed at least 22 militants in pakistan's waziristan region on wednesday, intelligence officials said, as the u.s. military steps up pressure on remnants of al qaeda and the taliban sheltered there.
document.title: suspected u.s. missile strike kills 22 militants in pakistan
lines_and_colors: missile attacks by suspected u.s. drone aircraft killed at least 22 militants in pakistan's waziristan region on wednesday, intelligence officials said, as the u.s. military steps up pressure on remnants of al qaeda and the taliban sheltered there.
